籤詩版本二:
Lin Wei damisa ne da ke tsaron ƙofa, dole ne ya kasance mai ƙarfi ba ya cutar da wasu.
A bayyane yake cewa babu wani shiri, damuwa, shakku, tsoro da tsoro suna cikin daji → itace.
詩意:
A cikin wannan hexagram, bishiyoyi da damisa a cikin gandun daji suna da ƙarfi.
Duk ƙararrawar ƙarya ba ta da gaske.
解曰: Murhu yana haskaka dusar ƙanƙara. Kamar iskar ta fado kan kunnuwa. Yana iya zama albarka. Abubuwa masu kyau suna zuwa kuma munanan abubuwa suna faruwa a gabansu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Pang Hong yana tsoron Bao Gong
Renzong na Daular Song. Bao Gong shi ne gwamnan lardin Kaifeng (sunan hukuma, daidai da lardi). Pang Hong shi ne surukin sarki (surukin sarki) kuma ya daure Janar Di Qing. Lokacin da Bao Gong ya nemi a yi shari'a kan lamarin, Pang Hong ya tsorata kuma ya toshe ta ta hanyoyi da dama. Daga baya, lamarin ya fito fili kuma an tabbatar da zargin da Pang Hong ya yi na karya. An mika shi ga dokar sarki Renzong na Daular Song kuma an sake shi saboda danginsa.
聖意: Rashin jin daɗi a gida, maganar kansa, neman kuɗi, sana’ar mugu, aure mara kyau, inshorar ƙarya na Liujia, hana tafiya tafiya, lalacewar tsutsa, lalacewar dabbobi shida, bacewar mutum, ƙarar jama’a, asara, ƙaura, ra’ayin mazan jiya, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, sadaukarwa. , Hushan kabari, mugu
古人: Pang Hong yana jin tsoron Bao Gong
